output_data.clarification_question: What was the total documented time for the encounter (start time to end time)? Time documentation is required to select the appropriate level of service (992XX or 9083X).
output_data.suggested_answer: 53 minutes? (This would typically support billing for an established combined service: 99214 and 90836, or a 90837.)

primary_code.description: Established Patient Office or Other Outpatient Visit, Moderate Complexity/MDM
primary_code.rationale: The encounter addressed significant depressive symptoms (*Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder*), included a high-risk review (passive suicidal ideation), and required complex management (titrating *Sertraline* dosage from 50mg to 100mg). This meets the criteria for Moderate Medical Decision Making (MDM) level 4.

addon_codes.rationale: The provider spent significant time assessing the impact of the depressive symptoms, performing a *C-SSRS risk assessment*, and providing counseling related to the patient's feelings of guilt and passive death ideation, warranting a substantial psychotherapy add-on. The final time documentation will confirm the specific add-on duration (30, 45, or 60 minutes).

output_data.medical_necessity: Management of a chronic, life-impacting condition (*Major Depressive Disorder*, F33.1) requiring medication adjustment due to treatment failure, and mandatory safety assessment for suicidal ideation.
